s ɛ z m ɛ z ɔ̃

ɛ l ɛ t ɑ̃ t j ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ t ɔ̃ b e d ɑ̃ l a m a ʁ
ɑ̃ p o l ɔ ɲ s e t a l ɑ̃ z o ʁ a t w a ʁ z e s ɔ̃ n e ʁ y d i s j ɔ̃ e t ɛ ʁ ə k ɔ n y p a ʁ t i k y l j ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ p a ʁ m i l a ʁ i s t ɔ k ʁ a s i
ʃ ɛ ʁ v u n ə d i ʁ e p a k ə ʒ ə n ə ɛ m ɛ̃ t ə ʁ ɛ s p w ɛ̃ a v o t ʁ s ɑ̃ t ə

l o t i s m ɑ̃ a ʁ u ʒ ɛ n a m ɔ̃ t o
i l ɛ l ə f i s d y p ɛ̃ t ʁ l e ɔ̃ l ɛ ʁ m i t e l ə p ɛ ʁ d ə f ʁ ɑ̃ s w a l ɛ ʁ m i t
k a n ə s ɔ ʁ p a d e ɑ̃ t ʁ n u
n o ʒ w ø z z ɔ̃ ʁ ə t ʁ u v e l ɑ̃ v i e l a ʁ a ʒ d ə v ɛ̃ k ʁ
ɔ̃ ʁ ə m a ʁ k l ə ʁ ɑ̃ d y d y k l i m a e d ə ɛ l a t m ɔ s f ɛ ʁ

y n i v ɛ ʁ s a l p i k t y ʁ n a p a v u l y l a d a p t e a k o z d ə s a k ʁ i t i k d e f i l m d o ʁ œ ʁ

i l e m ɛ t ɑ̃ n ɔ̃ d k u ʁ t p a ʁ s a t ɛ l i t e p a ʁ ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ n ɛ t
d ɑ̃ l a v ɛ ʁ s j ɔ̃ o ʁ i ʒ i n a l m a ʁ k i n o ɛ d u b l e p a ʁ n a o k i t a t s y t a
ʒ a n ɛ t o s i ɛ̃ t ʁ o v ɛ ʁ t i e ʁ o m ɑ̃ t i k k ə ʒ o a n a ɛ t ɛ k s t ʁ a v ɛ ʁ t i e s ɑ̃ s y ɛ l
ɛ l y ʁ y ɡ u ɛ ɛ t e l i m i n e o p ʁ ə m j e t u ʁ
f ɛ ʁ p a s e a v ɛ k œ̃ p ø d ə m aː ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ y d j ɔ d v a n i j
œ̃ n o t ʁ ʃ a p i t o f i ɡ y ʁ œ̃ ʒ w œ ʁ d ə s ɛ ʁ p ɑ̃

ʁ ə v ʁ ɔ l p a ʁ t a ʒ a v ɛ k b y s i ʃ a ʁ d ɔ n ɛ k l a ʁ m ɔ̃ t e v o s y ʁ m ɔ ʁ ʒ l ə k ɔ̃ p l ɛ k s ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ k ɔ m y n a l d ə ʃ a n j a z
l e d ø s a t ɛ l i t s ɔ̃ t i d ɑ̃ t i k
ɔ̃ n a p ʁ ɑ̃ k ə k i m n ɛ p a l ə f i s b j o l o ʒ i k d ə k ʁ i s t ɔ f
e ʁ e ɡ y l y s s ə p ɛ ʁ s y a d a s ɑ̃ p ɛ n k i l e t ɛ m ɔ ʁ

l ɑ̃ t ʁ ə p ʁ i z ɛ l ə p l y ɡ ʁ o p ʁ o d y k t œ ʁ a l m ɑ̃ d ə s i m ɑ̃
m ɛ z i l f o d ə ɛ l a ʁ ʒ ɑ̃ e ʒ ə ɛ n ɑ̃ n e p a

a l a s y i t d y n a l t ɛ ʁ k a s j ɔ̃ l e d ø k l ɑ̃ v ɔ̃ s ə ʁ ə t ʁ u v e k ɔ̃ f ʁ ɔ̃ t e z o z ɔ̃ b i
l e v w a j a ʒ œ ʁ t ʁ a v ɛ ʁ s ɛ l ə l a k p u ʁ a t ɛ̃ d ʁ a ʁ e ʒ y k y l a p ʁ o ʃ ɛ n s t a s j ɔ̃ d y t o k ɛ d o
o ʁ w a j o m y n i l ə t i t ʁ e ʒ ɛ k t a l ə s ɛ̃ ɡ l d ə s n a p
t ʁ ɛ b j ɛ̃ l a p a ʁ ɔ l ɛ t a m ə s j ø ʒ ɔ ɛ l a v i ʁ a n j ɛ

m a n y ɛ l m a ʁ j a p ɔ̃ s e t ɛ s ɔ̃ p ʁ o f ɛ s œ ʁ d ə k ɔ̃ t ʁ ə p w ɛ̃ e d ə k ɔ̃ p o z i s j ɔ̃
i l ɛ ɡ z i ʒ ɛ k ə l ɔ̃ v o t aː l a p ʁ i z d a ʁ m

t ə n e v w a s i l ə d ɔ s j e

l ə t o d e a d e z j ɔ̃ a l œ ʁ s ɛ̃ d i k a z ɛ t ʁ ɛ z ɛ̃ p ɔ ʁ t ɑ̃
l e p ʁ ə m j e ʁ e a k t œ ʁ z e t ɛ d e s i s t ɛ m z ɛ k s p e ʁ i m ɑ̃ t o z e d ə p y i s ɑ̃ s l i m i t e

l ɔ̃ k l ɛ d m s e v ɛ ʁ t y a

i l n ɔ̃ p a v u l y n e ɡ o s j e k w a k ə s ə s w a a v ɛ k m w a
d ɑ̃ l ɑ̃ s ɛ ɲ ə m ɑ̃ p y b l i k l e z e l ɛ v d e b y t l œ ʁ s k o l a ʁ i t e a l e k ɔ l e l e m ɑ̃ t ɛ ʁ ʒ ɑ̃ b a t i s t tʃ ɔː t i
p l y z j œ ʁ z a k t i v i t e p ɛ ʃ p ʁ o m n a d ɑ̃ b a ʁ k s ɔ̃ p ʁ o p o z e
l e d ø d i s p o z i t i f s ɔ̃ t y t i l z e k ɔ̃ p l e m ɑ̃ t ɛ ʁ
o m w a j ɛ̃ aː ʒ l a k t i v i t e e k o n o m i k d ə l a b a j s ə k ɔ̃ s ɑ̃ t ʁ ɛ t o s y d d y d o m ɛ n
l a d ə s y b ʁ ɑ̃ d b u ʁ z e b ɔ n ɛ z a p w a l l a ɡ a ʁ d s ɔ ʁ t i d y p ɔ̃ b a j ɔ n ɛ t b a s
i l p ʁ ɑ̃ p a ʁ o k ɔ̃ b a d y ʁ ɑ̃ l a ɡ ɛ ʁ d y p a s i f i k
b i b i ʃ ɔ̃ ɡ a n j ɑ̃ l a d ʁ w a t o d ə s y d y k a n a p e
ɛ l ɛ p l y f ʁ e k ɑ̃ t ʃ e l a d y l t d ə t i p k o k a z j ɛ̃
f e b t ɔ̃ k ɛ̃ d a n j ɛ l ʒ i l i z e k l ɛ ʁ ɔ l t i o ʁ ɔ̃ t e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ œ̃ ʁ oː l
l a p o ʃ ɛ t ɛ̃ s i k ə l ɔ ʁ d ʁ d e t i t ʁ d ə l e d i s j ɔ̃ n ɔ ʁ a m e ʁ i k ɛ n e t ɛ d i f e ʁ ɑ̃

l ə s y k s ɛ d y k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ p u s s əʊ n i a s ɔ ʁ t i ʁ œ̃ n a l b ɔ m
i l ɛ d i p l o m e d ə l y n i v ɛ ʁ s i t e n a s j o n a l d ə s e u l a v ɛ k y n f ɔ ʁ m a s j ɔ̃ ɑ̃ p s i k o l o ʒ i
k a ʃ e l ə k ɛ l k ə p a ʁ
ʁ o d ʁ i ɡ s e p ʁ ɑ̃ d ə ʃ i m ɛ n l a f i j d y k ɔ̃ t ɡ ɔ ʁ m a m ɛ s ə l y i s i d e z a p ʁ u v s ɛ t a m u ʁ

i l s a ʒ i d y p ʁ ə m j e ʁ a l b ɔ m d y ɡ ʁ u p ɑ̃ ʁ ʒ i s t ʁ e s ɑ̃ s a f ɔ ʁ m a s j ɔ̃ d o ʁ i ʒ i n

i l n u z a v ɛ t o s i b o k u p ɛ d e z a t ʁ u v e d e z a ʁ m p u ʁ l ə s u l ɛ v m ɑ̃
l a k ɔ m y n k ɔ̃ t l j ø d i z a d m i n i s t ʁ a t i f ʁ e p ɛ ʁ t o ʁ j e d ɔ̃ l ə ɡ ʁ ɑ̃ t e t ɑ̃ l a p ɛ̃ s ɔ n j ɛ ʁ l e ʒ ɔ̃ d ɛ l
p u ʁ o t ɑ̃ n u s a v ɔ̃ z o s i k ə ɛ l ɛ̃ d y s t ʁ i ɛ l t ʁ ɑ̃ s f ɔ ʁ m a t œ ʁ p ø t ɛ t ʁ y n t u t p ə t i t ɑ̃ t ʁ ə p ʁ i z

s ə b y dʒ ɛ ɛ ɛ l a k t d ə d e s ɛ d ə s ɛ t p ʁ o m ɛ s s o l ɛ n ɛ l d ə f ʁ ɑ̃ s w a ɔ l ɑ̃ d
i l ɛ t e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ l œ̃ d e t ʁ w a f ɔ̃ d a t œ ʁ d y s ɑ̃ t ʁ p u ʁ l e t y d d e ʁ i s k z ɛ ɡ z i s t ɑ̃ s j ɛ l

d ɑ̃ z œ̃ p ʁ ə m j e t ɑ̃ i l ʁ e ɔ ʁ ɡ a n i z a l a ʁ m e ɑ̃ n y n ɡ a ʁ d o ʁ ɑ̃ ʒ i s t
ɑ̃ p a s ɑ̃ d ə s u l e v i z i t œ ʁ p ø v t a p ɛ ʁ s ə v w a ʁ k i l p ɔ ʁ t œ̃ k a l s ɔ̃ a f l œ ʁ

n ə d i p a n ɔ̃

s ɔ̃ n a m t ʁ ɑ̃ b l ɛ t a s e l ə v ʁ k ɔ m y n ɡ u t d ə ʁ o z ə a y n f l œ ʁ
l e n i n s ɛ̃ k j ɛ t d ɑ̃ l a p ʁ ə m j ɛ ʁ n ɔ t d e ʁ i s k d ə s i s j ɔ̃ d ɑ̃ l ə p a ʁ t i k ɔ m y n i s t
l e ɡ l i z ɛ s i t y e d ɑ̃ l ə b u ʁ d ə m ɔ̃ p ɔ l ɛ̃
l e ʁ ɛ z ɔ̃ s ɔ̃ m y l t i p l m ɛ l a p ʁ ə m j ɛ ʁ ɛ ʒ e o p o l i t i k e l a s ə ɡ ɔ̃ d ɛ t e k o n o m i k
l ə ʁ e z y l t a ɛ n o t e p u ʁ ʃ a k z o n t ɛ s t e
l a p o p y l a s j ɔ̃ ɛ f ʁ ɑ̃ k o f ɔ n d ə p y i l ə ʁ ə p ø p l ə m ɑ̃ a p ʁ ɛ l a ɡ ɛ ʁ d ə t ʁ ɑ̃ t ɑ̃
m ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ p a t ʁ i ɔ t ɛ n ə t ɛ p w ɛ̃ ɔ m a d ə s ɛ s p ə ʁ e ɔ̃ l ə v w a
p a ʁ a j œ ʁ z i l f a s i l i t l ə s ə m i p a ʁ œ̃ s ə m w a ʁ m w ɛ̃ p ə z ɑ̃
k ɔ l a b o ʁ a t œ ʁ m ə s j ø m a ʁ k m i ʃ ɛ l p ɛ ʁ s ɔ n a ʒ z a k t œ ʁ k i ɔ̃ k ʁ e e l e ʁ oː l
l ə p ɛ ʁ s ɔ n ɛ l s w a n j ɑ̃ d ə ɛ l e t a b l i s m ɑ̃ ɛ l a v ɛ s y ʁ n ɔ m e ʒ e ʒ e
i l p ø t ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ v ə n i ʁ ɑ̃ n a m ɔ̃ t e u ɑ̃ n a v a l d e t ʁ a v o
t ɛ l ɛ n o t ʁ m a n j ɛ ʁ d e a p ʁ e ɑ̃ d e l e ʃ o z
d ə p y i l a s ɔ ʁ t i d y l i v ʁ i l a d ɔ n e d e k ɔ̃ f e ʁ ɑ̃ s p a ʁ t u d ɑ̃ l ə m ɔ̃ d
l i l ɛ t i n a b i t e e d ɛ s t i n e a d ə v n i ʁ œ̃ p a ʁ k d a t ʁ a k s j ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ s a k ʁ e a l a s k y l t y ʁ
ɔ k i k ə v u s w a j e v u s u v n e v u
v u n ɑ̃ p ɔ ʁ t e p a v o t ʁ ɡ ɛ̃ d i ʒ ə a m ə s j ø m ɑ̃ d e
ɔ̃ n o ʁ ɛ d i y n ɑ̃ s j ɛ n y z i n k i a v ɛ s ɛ s e d ə v i v ʁ d ə p y i p l y z j œ ʁ d e s ɛ n i
i l s a ʒ i d ə l i m i t e l e k u

l a n e f a z p ʁ e z ɑ̃ t d e f l y k t y a s j ɔ̃ s ɛ z ɔ n j ɛ ʁ d ə d e b i a s e m a ʁ k e
f i n a l m ɑ̃ l ə k ʁ aː n d ə l a p ə t i t s a ʁ a a e t e l o k a l i z e a b ɛ ʁ l ɛ̃
l a k ɔ m y n s ə s i t y d ɑ̃ l a m a ʁ ʃ

a m i n y i l ə v ɑ̃ f ʁ ɛ ʃ i

m a d a m b o v ɛ ɛ l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ ɛ t i l ʁ ə t i ʁ e ʒ ə l ə ʁ ə t i ʁ m ə s j ø l ə p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃
l ə b a t i m ɑ̃ p ʁ ɛ̃ s i p a l ɛ s i t y e s y ʁ l a p l a s d y m a ʁ ʃ e
s ə l a s ə ʁ ɛ t ʁ ɛ z ɛ̃ ʒ y s t e k ɔ̃ s t i t y ʁ ɛ t œ̃ d e t u ʁ n ə m ɑ̃ d ə ɛ l ɔ b ʒ ɛ d ə s ɛ t m ə z y ʁ
o ʁ ɛ s t t y n a p a t u ʒ u ʁ z e t e k ɔ̃ t ʁ
a ʒ ə s y i z a s e s a t i s f ɛ d ə m a p ʁ o m n a d
ʒ i ɑ̃ v j ɛ̃ z a ɛ l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ n y m e ʁ o t ʁ w a s ɑ̃ k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ d i s y i t
d e p ʁ ɔ b l ɛ m d ə s ɑ̃ t e l ə k ɔ̃ t ʁ ɛ n j t a ʁ ə t u ʁ n e a v j ɛ n
ɛ l o p ɛ ʁ a l e ʃ l ɔ̃ n a s j o n a l ʁ e ʒ j o n a l e s y ʁ l e v ɔ l ʃ a ʁ t e
l ə p ɛ m ɑ̃ d w a ɛ t ʁ f ɛ d ɑ̃ l e v ɛ̃ t k a t ʁ œ ʁ d ə l a k s ɛ p t a s j ɔ̃ s u p ɛ n d ə d e ʃ e ɑ̃ s

a p e p a s t ɑ̃ s

k ɛ l œ ʁ ɛ t i l

s a s t ʁ d e k u v ʁ l ə f ʊ t b ɔː l d ɑ̃ l ə k a ʁ t j e l a m ɔ s k a s i t y e d ɑ̃ l a v i l d e a v ɛ l a n d a

k a t a ʁ i n a ɑ̃ t ʁ ə t j ɛ̃ o s i y n ʁ ə l a s j ɔ̃ s a d o m a z o ʃ i s t a v ɛ k ɛ l e v ɛ k

l ɑ̃ d y i ɛ n e s ɛ s ɛ ʁ d y f ɛ k ə l ɑ̃ ɡ l d ɛ̃ s i d ɑ̃ s n ə p ɛ ʁ m ɛ p a d ə ʁ e f l ɛ k s j ɔ̃ t o t a l
m ɛ m ʃ ɔ z p u ʁ ɛ l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ n y m e ʁ o y i s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t d ø
l ə k œ ʁ d ə ʃ i p ʁ ɛ t y n m a ʁ k d ə ʃ i p ʁ
ɑ̃ k u ʁ d ə s ɛ z ɔ̃ i l ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ ʁ a d a d ʁ ɛ s e t ɑ̃ e ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ e o w aɪ l d d y m i n z o t a

d o t ʁ z a f i ʁ m k i l a e t e f ɔ̃ d e o p a ʁ l ə k ɔ ʁ d e a ʁ m e d e k u ʁ a s a n i d
ʒ ə k ʁ w a k ə s e ɛ t œ̃ k ɔ m i v w a j a ʒ œ ʁ ɑ̃ v ɛ̃
v ɛ̃ t s ɛ̃ k ʁ y m o z a i k ɔ̃ z s ɑ̃ a n a ʁ b ɔ n

t ʁ ɛ m a l a k œ j i p a ʁ l ə ɡ u v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃ b ʁ i t a n i k s ɛ t p ʁ o m o s j ɔ̃ ɛ t a n y l e
e s ɑ̃ ʁ a p ɔ ʁ
s ɛ t y n m e t e o ʁ i t d ə f ɛ ʁ e p l y p ʁ e s i z e m ɑ̃ y n ɔ k t a e d ʁ i t

a k w a ɔ k y p e v u v o t ʁ t ɑ̃ l i b ʁ

l a p ʁ e z ɑ̃ s d ə m o ʁ i z ɔ̃ d ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ n e k i p v a ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ e l ə d ɛ s t ɛ̃ d ə m a d ɛ n
s ə z i ɛ k l ɛ ʁ a l a ʃ ɑ̃ b ʁ a p ɔ s t o l i k

p l y t a ʁ i l ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ a n u v o ɛ ʁ v e v i l ɛ ʃ ɛ z a v ɑ̃ d ə ʁ ə p a ʁ t i ʁ p u ʁ l ɑ̃ ɡ l ə t ɛ ʁ
i l a p a s e l ə p w a l u ʁ z a ɛ l a ʁ m e e i l ɛ v ə n y t ɑ̃ t e s a ʃ ɑ̃ s a p a ʁ i

l ə b a ʁ ɔ̃ v ɔ̃ k ɛ t l e e t ɛ d y n v j ɛ j f a m i j d ə l a ʁ i s t ɔ k ʁ a s i a l m ɑ̃ d o ʁ i ʒ i n ɛ ʁ d ə m y n s t ɛ ʁ
s e ɛ p u ʁ k w a l e d e p y t e d y ɡ ʁ u p m o d ɛ m s u t j ɛ̃ d ʁ ɔ̃ s ɛ t a ʁ t i k l
i l ʁ ə s ə v ʁ a y n m e d a j d ə l a v a l œ ʁ m i l i t ɛ ʁ p u ʁ s e m e ʁ i t s y ʁ l ə f ʁ ɔ̃
y n n u v ɛ l ɡ a ʁ ɛ k ɔ̃ s t ʁ y i t p u ʁ d ɛ s ɛ ʁ v i ʁ l ə f y t y ʁ ɔ s k ɔ p p ʁ ɔ ʃ d ə p w a t j e

ʒ ə m ɔ̃ t

y i t a ʁ y d ə w ɪ l ə
i l ɛ t ɛ m e

l e ɡ l i z ɛ s i t y e d ɑ̃ l ə d e p a ʁ t ə m ɑ̃ f ʁ ɑ̃ s ɛ d y m ɔ ʁ b j ɑ̃ s y ʁ l a k ɔ m y n d ə p l u ʁ ɛ
v ɛ̃ t y i ʁ y p ʁ ɔ s p e ʒ u n o s w a s ɑ̃ t d i z n œ f d ø s ɑ̃ p ɑː θ ə n eɪ
s e ɛ t œ̃ p ʁ ɛ̃ s i p d ə ʒ y s t i s e s e ɛ l ə p ʁ ɛ̃ s i p m ɛ m d ə l a p e ʁ e k a s j ɔ̃

l ɛ k s t ʁ e m i t e s y p e ʁ j œ ʁ s u l a k ɔ ʁ n i ʃ ɑ̃ f ɔ ʁ t s a j i ɛ t ɔ k y p e p a ʁ y n m ɛ z z a n i n

i l k ɔ̃ t k a t ʁ v i k t w a ʁ p ʁ o f ɛ s j ɔ n ɛ l t u t z a k i z l ɔ ʁ d e t a p d ə k u ʁ s z a l m ɑ̃ d

a v ɑ̃ l a s ə ɡ ɔ̃ d ɡ ɛ ʁ m ɔ̃ d j a l v i l n j y s e t ɛ l œ̃ d e p l y ɡ ʁ ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ t ʁ ʒ y i f d ø ʁ ɔ p
i l n ə v œ l n i p ɛ n i t ʁ ɛ v n i a f ɛ ʁ d ɔ n œ ʁ ɑ̃ d ə ɔ ʁ d ə l œ ʁ z ɛ̃ t e ʁ ɛ
l ə k ɔ̃ t e k ɔ̃ p ʁ ɑ̃ l a s œ l v i l d ə b l a k ɔː l

i l p ʁ i ʁ p l a s a l a t a b l d y k a ʁ ə e n ə p a ʁ l ə ʁ p w ɛ̃ d e ɛ ʁ t ɔ̃

l e p e p ɛ̃ d e p ʁ ə m j e f ʁ y i z e t ɛ t a ʁ ɔ̃ d i e ɡ ʁ o m ɛ n ə ʒ ɛ ʁ m ɛ p a
a v u ɛ n o ʁ j e p a z i s i œ̃ p l ɑ̃ d y n u v o p a ʁ i

v j ɛ̃ d ʁ ɔ̃ t i l ʒ y s k i s i

i l ɛ t a l o ʁ i ʒ i n d ə k ɛ l k ə s u ʒ ɑ̃ ʁ t ɛ l k ə θ ɹ a ʃ ɐ b ɪ l i p ʌ ŋ k ɐ b ɪ l i s ɜː f ɐ b ɪ l i e ɡ ɒ θ ɐ b ɪ l i

l e l o b p ʁ e z ɑ̃ t d ə n ɔ̃ b ʁ ø z f i b ʁ i j m a ʁ ʒ i n a l
l ə k e b ɛ k k ɔ̃ t t ʁ w a f a k y l t e k i d ɔ n ɛ l ɑ̃ s ɛ ɲ ə m ɑ̃ ʁ ə k i
s ɛ t i s ʁ a ɛ l k i ɡ a ɲ s e p ʁ ə m j e ʃ ɑ̃ p j ɔ n a z ɔ f i s j ɛ l
s e d ø z ɛ̃ v ɑ̃ t œ ʁ s ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ s i d e ʁ e k ɔ m l e p ɛ ʁ d y t a j k ʁ ɛ j ɔ̃ m a n y ɛ l ɑ̃ k ɔ ʁ y t i l i z e o ʒ u ʁ d y i
l ə s e l ɛ b ʁ p ɔ ɛ m f y k ɔ̃ p o z e p a ʁ m ɛ l p a θ ə n a ʁ ɛ j a n a b a t a t i ʁ i
s e f ɔ̃ k s j ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ p ʁ ə n ɛ l a d m i n i s t ʁ a s j ɔ̃ l o k a l l a p o l i s l e t ʁ a v o p y b l i k z e l e z e l ɛ k s j ɔ̃

i l a d e t a j e l e d i f e ʁ ɑ̃ t v w a d ə l a t ʁ a d i s j ɔ̃ d ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ n e p i t ʁ ɛ̃ t i t y l e ʁ y m y z
l a d i v ɛ ʁ s i t e d e t i p d e ɛ ʁ k ə ɛ l ɔ̃ t ʁ u v d ɑ̃ ɛ l ɔ ʁ f ə o d ə s k a ʁ l a t i ɛ ʁ ə m a ʁ k a b l

l a m y z i k ɛ k ɔ̃ p o z e p u ʁ l ɔ k a z j ɔ̃ p a ʁ l ə ɡ i t a ʁ i s t f ʁ ɛ d f ɹ ɪ θ
v u z a v e ʁ ə s y m a l ɛ t ʁ
i l i a v ɛ d ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ n ɛ ɡ z i s t ɑ̃ s d ə ɛ l ɛ̃ f ʁ ɑ̃ ʃ i s a b l
s ə l a a p u ʁ k ɔ̃ s e k ɑ̃ s l ɛ ɡ z i s t ɑ̃ s d y n p i l ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ k ə s t ʁ y k t y ʁ d ə d ɔ n e
ʁ ə n a t a t o m a n o v a ʁ ɑ̃ p ɔ ʁ t l ə s ɛ̃ p l d a m
u a l b ɛ ʁ e t ɛ t i n o s ɑ̃ u ɛ l e t ɛ s a k ɔ̃ p l i s
p u ʁ s ə f ɛ ʁ i l s ə d e ɡ i z ɑ̃ p ʁ ɛ t ʁ e d ə v j ɛ̃ f ɑː ð ə m y ʁ f i

n u z i s ɔ m f a v o ʁ a b l
s a v i p ʁ i v e ɛ t ʁ ɛ p ø k ɔ n y
l a z o n ɛ t ʁ ɛ p ø p ø p l e

d ø f ʁ ɛ ʁ

t ɛ t d ə l ɑ̃ s ɛ t

n u v u l ə k ɔ̃ f i ʁ m ɔ̃ d ɔ̃ k s i s ə t ɛ k s t ɛ v o t e n u s ɛ z i ʁ ɔ̃ l ə k ɔ̃ s ɛ j k ɔ̃ s t i t y s j ɔ n ɛ l

d a p ʁ ɛ l ə ʒ u ʁ n a l l e k i p l e f a v o ʁ i s ɔ̃ l a ʁ o ʃ ɛ l m a ʁ s ɛ j e l ə m ɔ ʁ b j ɑ̃
s a v y ɛ s a f ɛ b l i a v ɛ k ɛ l aː ʒ

b ɛ ʁ n a ʁ p i z a n i ɛ ʃ ə v a l j e d ə ɛ l ɔ ʁ d ʁ d e z a ʁ z e d e l ɛ t ʁ
l a l a ʁ ʒ œ ʁ d ə s ɔ̃ ɛ s t ʁ ɑ̃ v a ʁ i a s e f ɔ ʁ t ə m ɑ̃ ɑ̃ f ɔ̃ k s j ɔ̃ d y k o ɛ f i s j ɑ̃ d e m a ʁ e
p ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ s i m w a d ə n o v ɑ̃ b ʁ ɑ̃ ʒ y ɛ̃ k ɔ̃ t i n y ɛ ʁ d ɑ̃ p a ʁ i l e s a k ʁ i f i s z y m ɛ̃
s a v ɛ ʁ d œ̃ ɛ t o s i œ̃ o l j ø d ə l a ʁ e z i s t ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ n a ʁ j ɛ ʒ

ʁ a f a ɛ l n a d a l a a k t y ɛ l m ɑ̃ ʁ ɑ̃ p ɔ ʁ t e d y ɡ ʁ ɑ̃ ʃ ə l ɛ m a v ɛ k s ɔ̃ n ɔ̃ k l
i l a l a p a ʁ t i k y l a ʁ i t e d ɛ t ʁ p a ʁ t a ʒ e ɑ̃ t ʁ l a ʁ ʒ ɑ̃ t i n e l ə ʃ i l i
ɛ l o l i v ʁ ɛ k ɔ m y n a l ɛ n ɔ k y p ɛ d ɔ̃ k k ə k ɛ l k ə d i z ɛ n d e ɛ k t a ʁ z ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ p l ɑ̃ t a s j ɔ̃

i l f y t ɛ̃ s k ʁ i s y ʁ l a l i s t n w a ʁ d y s i n e m a

œ̃ ʁ u ʒ

s e z a ʁ ɛ s t a s j ɔ̃ z ɔ̃ t e t e k ʁ i t i k e p a ʁ l y n j ɔ̃ ø ʁ o p e ɛ n n o t a m ɑ̃
ɛ s ə k ə s e ɛ m a f o t s i t ɔ̃ p ʁ ə m j e m a ʁ i t e a t ʁ ɔ̃ p e

l a p ɑ̃ s e f ɔ̃ d a m ɑ̃ t a l d ə m ɛ t s t u ʁ n o t u ʁ d ə l a t ɑ̃ s j ɔ̃ a l a s u f ʁ ɑ̃ s d e o t ʁ y i

n u d ə v ɔ̃ z e s ɛ j e d ə ɛ l a p l i k e p u ʁ v w a ʁ ɛ s i l m a ʁ ʃ u n ɔ̃
l a p ʁ ɛ̃ s ɛ s z a m i k ɔ f v j ɛ̃ d ə m ɑ̃ d e o m ɛ t ʁ d ə f ɛ ʁ s ɔ̃ p ɔ ʁ t ʁ ɛ

p u ʁ l a t ʁ w a z j ɛ m p l a s s ɛ l e k i p d ə f ʁ ɑ̃ s k i l a ɑ̃ p ɔ ʁ t e s y ʁ l ɑ̃ ɡ l ə t ɛ ʁ

ɛ l a p ʁ ɔ ʃ d ə p ʁ i t i k ɛ̃ e ɛ l a p ʁ ɔ ʃ d ə b ɛ ʁ n ʃ t a j n p ʁ ɛ s k ʁ i v t y n a k t i v i t e f i z i k k ɔ̃ s e k ɑ̃ t

a b ɑː b ə ɹ i ɛ ɡ z i s t œ̃ n ɑ̃ b ʁ ɑ̃ ʃ m ɑ̃ p ʁ i v e a v w a m e t ʁ i k d ɛ s ɛ ʁ v ɑ̃ y n k a ʁ j ɛ ʁ
i l s ə l ə v a e a l a ʒ y s k a l a f ə n ɛ t ʁ
t ʁ ɛ z ʃ ə m ɛ̃ d ə l a ʁ ɛ ʁ
m ɛ ʒ ə n ə s y i p a z œ̃ e ʁ o ʒ ə s y i l a s a n a ʒ ə ʁ ɛ s t ʁ e m w a m ɛ m
i l ɛ k s p ɔ z ʁ e ɡ y l j ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ o s a l ɔ̃ d e z a ʁ t i s t f ʁ ɑ̃ s ɛ z e i ʁ ə s w a p l y z j œ ʁ m e d a j
k l ɛ d ə m ɑ̃ d p a ʁ l a s y i t a k i n d ə l e p u z e

p a m ɛ m p u ʁ l a v ɑ̃ ʒ ɑ̃ s

s ə p ɛ i z a ʒ k a ʁ a k t e ʁ i s t i k p ɛ ʁ m ɛ d ə ʁ ə t ʁ u v e l e t ʁ a s d e ɡ l a s j e
l ə p ʁ e z ɑ̃ a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ p ʁ e v w a d e e t ɑ̃ d ʁ s ɛ t ɛ ɡ z o n e ʁ a s j ɔ̃ o z o p e ʁ a s j ɔ̃ ʁ e a l i z e s y ʁ n o t ʁ t ɛ ʁ i t w a ʁ
s ɔ̃ s j ɛ ʒ ɛ t a l uː d ɪ ŋ t ə n
s e ʃ i f ʁ l a s i t y t a l a d ø z j ɛ m p l a s d ə l a l i ɲ a p ʁ ɛ z ɛ l b œ f
p a ʁ a l ɛ l m ɑ̃ i l a k ɔ̃ p l i s e z ɔ b l i ɡ a s j ɔ̃ m i l i t ɛ ʁ z a t ɛ n j ɑ̃ l ə ɡ ʁ a d d ə m a ʒ ɔ ʁ
d y ʁ ɑ̃ l a p e ʁ j ɔ d s ɑ̃ ɡ o k y s i t ʁ u v ɛ l ə ʃ a t o f y k ɛ j a k i a p a ʁ t ə n ɛ t o k l ɑ̃ y ə z y ʒ i
t ʁ ɑ̃ t ʁ y d ə l a ʃ a ʁ ɑ̃ t s ɛ z m i l ɑ̃ ɡ u l ɛ m

l e ʃ ɑ̃ t ø z s ɔ̃ n u v ɛ l

s e ɛ l ə p ɛ ʁ d ə p ɔ l ɑ̃ k a d ə p a s a ʒ ɑ̃ f ʁ ɑ̃ s k i d e k u v ʁ s ə t y b
p a ʁ k ɔ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ k a p t i v i t e i l s ɔ̃ t ʁ ɛ z a k t i f d y ʁ ɑ̃ l a ʒ u ʁ n e
ɛ l e t ɛ t a ʁ i v e l a s ɛ̃ k j ɛ m
ʒ i e d e p o z e d ø s u z a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ k ə ʒ ə d e f ɑ̃ d ʁ e ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ b l m a d a m l a p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃ t
s e z o ʁ i ʒ i n s ɔ̃ n a p o l i t ɛ n
l w i dʒ i m ɔ z z a n i ɛ n e d ɑ̃ z y n f a m i j ɛ k s t ʁ ɛ m m ɑ̃ p o v ʁ o ʁ i ʒ i n ɛ ʁ d ə ɑ̃ k o n a
s ɛ t a l ɔ ʁ k i l ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ l e k ʁ i v ɛ̃ e d w a ʁ l i m o n ɔ v k i l k ɔ̃ s i d ɛ ʁ k ɔ m œ̃ m ɑ̃ t ɔ ʁ
i l i k ɔ̃ t ʁ a k t l a p ɛ s t m ɛ z ɑ̃ s y ʁ v i
i l v i z i t n j uː j ɔː k ʃ i k a ɡ o e f e n i k s
n y l n ə p ø s ɛ ʁ t i f j e a v ɛ k ɛ ɡ z a k t i t y d k ɔ m ɑ̃ ɛ t a p a ʁ y s ə k u v ʁ ʃ ɛ f o s ɛ̃ t

a t y a z y d e m ɛ t ʁ ɛ s

w i ʒ ə l y t e k ɔ̃ t ʁ m w a

d ɑ̃ s ɛ t v i d y ʁ e o s t ɛ ʁ l a n o s j ɔ̃ d ə p l ɛ z i ʁ ɛ n a p a s a p l a s
ɛ l s ə ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ d ɑ̃ l e m y n i s i p a l i t e d ə v a l ɑ̃ s a e d ə m i ɡ ɛ l p ə ʁ ɛ ʁ a

i l ɛ t a k t i f p ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ l a ʁ e v o l y s j ɔ̃ ʁ y s e d y ʁ ɑ̃ l a ɡ ɛ ʁ s i v i l ɑ̃ p ʁ o v ɛ̃ s

œ̃ l a v l ɛ̃ ʒ b ʁ y i j ɑ̃

e s ɛ t u

s e m ɑ̃ b ʁ s ə k ɔ̃ p ɔ z p ʁ ɛ̃ s i p a l m ɑ̃ d e s a m əʊ n z a m e ʁ i k ɛ̃

l a p a ʁ ɔ l ɛ t a m ə s j ø ʒ ɑ̃ p j ɛ ʁ d ɔː p u ʁ s u t n i ʁ ɛ l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ i d ɑ̃ t i k n y m e ʁ o s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t s ɛ z
b ɔ̃ n u v w a l a s i n u p u ʁ ɔ̃ v o t e ɛ s ə k ʁ i a l ə m ɛ ʁ

ɛ s ə k ə ʒ ə m ə t ʁ ɔ̃ p v u n ə v u t ʁ ɔ̃ p e p a m ɔ̃ n a m i
m ɛ̃ t n ɑ̃ ɛ l ɛ m y ʁ e
t y ʁ b o p a s k a l ʁ ɛ s t y t i l i z e s y ʁ t u d ɑ̃ l e d y k a s j ɔ̃

s a s i ʁ k ɔ̃ v a l a s j ɔ̃ p ʁ ə s ɑ̃ t ɛ t œ̃ d j a m ə t ʁ d ə v ɛ̃ t d ø l j ø z ɑ̃ v i ʁ ɔ̃

b ʁ o n o p ʁ ə m j e m ɛ m i l y i s ɑ̃ n œ f

s ɔ̃ ʃ ɛ f l j ø ɛ k y m a n a

k a ʁ ɑ̃ t s ɛ̃ k p ə t i z a n i m o

i l s ə k ɔ̃ p ɔ z d ə d i m ɑ̃ b ʁ d o ʁ i ʒ i n n o t a m ɑ̃ a l ʒ e ʁ j ɛ n t y n i z j ɛ n z a f ʁ i k ɛ n z e ʁ e y n j ɔ n ɛ z

a k ɛ l d i s t ɑ̃ s ə t ɛ t ɔ̃ d ə l a v i d ə l a t ɛ ʁ d e z ɔ m

d i t k ɛ l k ə ʃ ɔ z

l a t ʁ ɑ̃ s f ɔ ʁ m a s j ɔ̃ f i z i k s ɑ̃ d u t d e t ɛ ʁ m i n ɛ l ə ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ m ɑ̃ m o ʁ a l
s ɛ t k l a s a s y s i t e l a t ɑ̃ s j ɔ̃ ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ n a s j o n a l ɑ̃ ʁ ɛ z ɔ̃ d ə s e p ɛ ʁ f ɔ ʁ m ɑ̃ s z ɑ̃ f y ʁ t i v i t e

y n a t m ɔ s f ɛ ʁ ʒ a k o b i n ʁ e n j ɛ

p l y z j œ ʁ z a d a p t a s j ɔ̃ z ɔ̃ t e t e p ʁ o d y i t s y ʁ d i f e ʁ ɑ̃ t k ɔ̃ s o l
f ɔ̃ m o b i l e ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ ɑ̃

n u z ɑ̃ s ɔ m z o ʒ u ʁ y i a ɛ l o ʁ e

i l d ə v ɛ̃ p a ʁ l a s y i t d i ʁ ɛ k t œ ʁ s j ɑ̃ t i f i k p u ʁ l ə m i n i s t ɛ ʁ d ə l a d e f ɑ̃ s i s ʁ a e l j ɛ̃

d ɛ s a n ɛ s ɑ̃ s l a ʁ i v j ɛ ʁ s o ʁ j ɑ̃ t v ɛ ʁ l w ɛ s t

ʁ y d ə l a b ɔ̃ l ø v ʁ o z w e ɑ̃ t u ʁ ɛ n
ɔ̃ l y i d w a l ɛ̃ t ʁ o d y k s j ɔ̃ d ə l a d y b w a z i n k ɔ m t ʁ ɛ t m ɑ̃ d ə l a m a l a d i d ə p a ʁ k ɛ̃ s ɔ̃

l a t ʁ a d i s j ɔ̃ ɑ̃ s i k l o p e d i k s ɛ ʁ ɛ̃ s i a l a p ʁ a t i k d ə l a p ʁ e d i k a s j ɔ̃

l a s ɑ̃ b l e v o t a l y ʁ ʒ ɑ̃ s s y ʁ s ɛ t p ʁ o p o z i s j ɔ̃ k ɛ l a d ɔ p t a ɑ̃ s y i t a y n ɡ ʁ ɑ̃ d m a ʒ o ʁ i t e

s a v i l ɛ t a p l e i ʁ a m

ɛ l l ə p ʁ i l y i f i ʁ ɛ s p i ʁ e d e s ɛ l
i l s a ʒ i d ə l a p ʁ ə m j ɛ ʁ k ɔ p ʁ o d y k s j ɔ̃ f ʁ ɑ̃ k o ʃ i n w a z
i l m u ʁ y a l a s y i t d œ̃ n a k s i d ɑ̃ d ə ʒ ø o k ɔ l ɛ ʒ d ə k l ɛ ʁ m ɔ̃
y n p ə t i t ʃ a p ɛ l e ʒ o l i
t ʁ ɑ̃ t t ʁ w a ʁ u t d ə l a b a t ʁ i
ɛ l s ə s i t y d ɑ̃ l a m ə ʁ ɛ̃ d a d d ə p ɑ̃ p l y n
t u k ɔ m s ɔ̃ f ʁ ɛ ʁ s e s k y l t y ʁ z e t ɛ f ɔ̃ d y z e e d i t e p a ʁ i p o l i t p ɛ ʁ ɔ l

l a f i t e t u f ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ m y ʁ m y ʁ m ɛ m

p ɛ ʁ s ɔ n n ə v ø ʁ e n j e

v w a ʁ d u b l ə v e d u b l ə v e d u b l ə v e i ʁ i ʃ ʁ a j i p u ʁ p l y d ɛ̃ f ɔ ʁ m a s j ɔ̃

ɛ l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ d ə m ə s j ø l ɛ tʃ ɪ m i a p ɔ ʁ t d ɔ̃ k y n p ʁ e s i z j ɔ̃ y t i l l a k ɔ m i s j ɔ̃ i ɛ f a v o ʁ a b l

l e p j ɛ s ʃ w a z i z e t ɛ s u v ɑ̃ d e z œ v ʁ k ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ p o ʁ ɛ n z a b ɔ ʁ d ɑ̃ p a ʁ f w a d e s y ʒ ɛ d a k t y a l i t e
e l a s

ʒ o b e i ʁ e a ʒ u t a k ɛ n ɛ k

a p l o d i s m ɑ̃ s y ʁ l e b ɑ̃ d y ɡ ʁ u p ɛ s ɛ ʁ s e n u z ɑ̃ v ə n ɔ̃ z o p ɔ ʁ t p a ʁ ɔ l d e ɡ ʁ u p

l a ʁ y i n ɛ k ɔ̃ p o z e d ə d ø ʁ o ʃ e s y ʁ l ə s ɔ m ɛ d ə l a m ɔ̃ t a ɲ
d ə n ɔ̃ b ʁ ø t i p z ɑ̃ t i k d ə s ɛ ʁ k œ j z e s a ʁ k o f a ʒ s ɔ̃ k ɔ n y
s ɛ t œ̃ m i n i s t ʁ a k ɔ̃ p l i
p ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ s ə t ɑ̃ ʒ ə ɛ l a k a b l e d ə k ɛ s t j ɔ̃ z o k ɛ l z i l ɛ s ɑ̃ p ʁ ɛ s a d ə ʁ ə p ɔ̃ d ʁ
ɑ̃ t o n ɛ l o s e t ɑ̃ t e ʃ a p e s ə v w a k ɔ̃ f i s k e t u s e b j ɛ̃ z e d w a ʁ f y i ʁ ɑ̃ f ʁ ɑ̃ s

k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ t t ʁ w a ʁ u t d a n ə s i s w a s ɑ̃ t t ʁ ɛ z k a t ʁ s ɑ̃ z a y ʒ i n

t u t l e t ʁ a d y k s j ɔ̃ d ɔ n e s i d ə s u n ə p ø v l y i ɛ t ʁ a t ʁ i b y e a v ɛ k s ɛ ʁ t i t y d
f ɛ ʁ n ɑ̃ d z ɛ t ʁ ɛ z a k t i f d ɑ̃ b o k u d ə m u v m ɑ̃ b i ʁ m ɑ̃ z ɑ̃ t i ɡ u v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃ t o
l ə s ə ɡ ɔ̃ d ə s e ʁ a m o s ə p ɛ ʁ p e t y ɑ̃ n a ʁ ʒ ɑ̃ t i n
ɑ̃ ʃ ə m ɛ̃ ɛ l ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ l j o n ɛ l y t s d ə v n y p a t ʁ ɔ̃ d y n a ʒ ɑ̃ s i m o b i l j ɛ ʁ
l e f i n i s j ɔ̃ s ə ʁ ɔ̃ ʁ e a l i z e a v ɛ k y n t ʁ y ɛ l

i l ɛ s i t y e a w ɒ ʃ ɪ ŋ t ə n
i l ʁ ə d ə v ɛ̃ t a v ø ɡ l

l a s i n j a s j ɔ̃ t ʁ u v e p a ʁ ɛ l a l ɡ ɔː ɹ ɪ θ m d ə s a t i s f ə z a b i l i t e p ø t ɛ t ʁ i m e d j a t m ɑ̃ t ʁ a d y i t ɑ̃ p l ɑ̃
l ɔ ʁ d y t u ʁ n w a i l ʒ u t ʁ w a m a t ʃ
s a f ʁ e n e z i l e t u f a

o p l y z ɔ̃ s ə ʁ a m u j e
s ɛ z s ɑ̃ t j e d e m o ʁ ɔ t
ʒ ə s y i s ɛ z i d ə d ø z a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ z i d ɑ̃ t i k n y m e ʁ o s ɛ̃ s ɑ̃ k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ d i z n œ f e t ʁ w a s ɑ̃ k a ʁ ɑ̃ t

m e l a n i v j ɛ̃ ɛ m ɛ d e a d e b a ʁ a s e l a v w a t y ʁ
b j ɛ̃ t ɔ̃ l e p a n o s ə ʁ ə f ɛ ʁ m ɛ ʁ
i l p a ʁ k u ʁ t y n v ɛ̃ t ɛ n d ə k i l o m ɛ t ʁ p a ʁ y n m a ʁ ʃ d ə n y i

ɛ l ɛ m t a s œ ʁ
y n ʃ a m a n v i d ɑ̃ z œ̃ v i l a ʒ d ə p ɛ ʃ œ ʁ

ɛ l d e k u v ʁ a l ɔ ʁ a v ɛ k ʁ a v i s m ɑ̃ l a t m ɔ s f ɛ ʁ d ə l a k ɔ m y n l i b ʁ d ə m ɔ̃ m a ʁ t ʁ
ɛ l ɛ l a s œ ʁ d ə l a i z a l ə ʁ y s o t ʁ ʒ w ø z ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ n a s j o n a l
s ɛ t œ̃ s p e s j a l i s t d e ɛ ʁ p e t o f o n z o s t ʁ a l j ɛ n e k a l e d o n j ɛ n
i l s ə p ø k ə m a m e m w a ʁ s w a v a ɡ a s ə s y ʒ ɛ
t j ɛ̃ s e ɛ m ə s j ø d ə s ɛ̃ ɡ l y t ɛ n
m ɛ n u m ɛ̃ t n ɔ̃ z e v i d a m ɑ̃ l ə m e k a n i s m d ə ʁ ə k ɔ n ɛ s ɑ̃ s d e y n e v ɑ̃ t y ɛ l ɛ̃ k a p a s i t e f i z i k
n u n ə f i n i ʁ ɔ̃ ʒ a m ɛ d ə d e ʒ ø n e
l ə d o m ɛ n ɛ k ɔ̃ p o z e d œ̃ n ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ b l f ɔ ʁ t i f j e d y ɛ s
t ʁ ɛ b j ɛ̃ l a p a ʁ ɔ l ɛ t a m ə s j ø ɡ i j o m l a ʁ i v e
ɑ̃ m a ʁ s l a ʃ a p ɛ l d ə l a f a m i j o t w a ɛ p ʁ o f a n e

z a p a t e ʁ o ʃ i ʁ a k ʃ ʁ o d e e p ɛ ʁ s ɔ̃ o p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃ d ə l a k ɔ m i s j ɔ̃ ø ʁ o p e ɛ n

f i n a l m ɑ̃ i l f i n ɑ̃ s l y i m ɛ m l e f ʁ ɛ

i l ɛ k ɔ̃ s t i t y e d ə d ø b a t i m ɑ̃

m w a ʒ ɛ m

l e t a l b o k ɑ̃ t a ɛ l p u ʁ ɔ̃ t e f ɛ k t y e l a d i s t ɑ̃ s s ɑ̃ ʁ ə f ɛ ʁ l ə p l ɛ̃
s e k ʁ w a z e d o ʒ i v k ɔ̃ p ʁ ɛ n d e l j ɛ ʁ n z e d e t j ɛ ʁ s ə ʁ ɔ̃
s i n ɔ̃ ʒ i i s ə ʁ e d e f a v o ʁ a b l

s e ɛ t a s e
p a ʁ a l ɛ l m ɑ̃ a s ɛ t ɑ̃ ɡ a ʒ m ɑ̃ ɛ l ʒ u d ɑ̃ p l y z j œ ʁ l ɔ̃ m e t ʁ a ʒ s ə d e ʁ u l ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ n a f ʁ i k
m a ʁ s ɛ j ɑ̃ f ɛ p a ʁ t i d y d j o s ɛ z d ə m ɔ̃ p ɛ l j e e d ə l a p a ʁ w a s d y l i t o ʁ a l a ɡ ɐ θ w ɑː

s ə ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ m ɑ̃ ʁ e z y l t ə ʁ ɛ d œ̃ ʁ a l ɑ̃ t i s m ɑ̃ d ə l a v i t ɛ s d ə ʁ o t a s j ɔ̃ d ə l a p l a n ɛ t

b o ʁ e ʁ o ɛ t ɛ ɡ z i l e ɑ̃ ʒ a m a i k

a p ʁ ɛ t ʁ w a s ɛ z ɔ̃ z i l ʁ ə ʒ w ɛ̃ l o t ʁ k l œ b m a ʒ œ ʁ d y b a s k ɛ t b ɔː l ɡ ʁ ɛ k l o l ɛ̃ p j a k o l ə p i ʁ e

l e k o n o m i d ə l a v i l d ə t ɑ̃ ɡ j e t a ʁ ə p ɔ z s y ʁ p l y z j œ ʁ z a k t i v i t e z a p ʁ e d o m i n ɑ̃ s a ɡ ʁ i k ɔ l
l a m e t ɔ d ɛ s a v ɛ ʁ e f i k a s
l ə s œ j d a k y m y l a s j ɔ̃ d e l a k t a t k o ʁ ɛ s p ɔ̃ o p w ɛ̃ d ɛ̃ f l ɛ k s j ɔ̃ d ə l a k u ʁ b
m ə s j ø t u ʁ ɛ ʁ ə t i ʁ e v u v o t ʁ a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ w i m ə s j ø l ə p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃
ɑ̃ b ɔ n k ʁ e t j ɛ n ɛ l ʁ ə v n ɛ t u ʒ u ʁ t ɑ̃ d ʁ l a ʒ u p u ʁ s ə m ɔ ʁ f l e y n o t ʁ v a n
l ə ʁ ə ʒ i s t ʁ p a ʁ w a s j a l d ə s ɛ̃
a s ə m o i m ə d j a t m ɑ̃ t ʁ a d y i t a l k a v f y ɑ̃ t u ʁ ə d e s ɛ t v w a j a ʒ œ ʁ

n u ʁ ə t ɔ̃ b ɔ̃ d ɑ̃ z y n o t ʁ f ɔ ʁ m d e ɛ̃ k o e ʁ ɑ̃ s d ɔ̃ n u ʁ ə p a ʁ l ə ʁ ɔ̃ t u t a ɛ l œ ʁ

f ɔ s t e k ɔ m ɑ̃ d l a d ø z j ɛ m b ʁ i ɡ a d d ə l a p ʁ ə m j ɛ ʁ d i v i z j ɔ̃ d ə m i k a ɛ l k ɔ ʁ k o ʁ ɑ̃

ʒ i ɛ m

i l ɛ t ɑ̃ d a l e t ʁ a v a j e
l ɔ ʁ d e d ə m i f i n a l l e z e k i p s a f ʁ ɔ̃ t s y ʁ y n m ɑ̃ ʃ
t u l e l j ø s i ʁ k ɔ̃ v w a z ɛ̃ z i f u ʁ n i s ɛ l œ ʁ k ɔ̃ t ɛ̃ ʒ ɑ̃ d e ɛ̃ s ɛ k t
d ɛ l aː ʒ d ə n œ v ɑ̃ z ɛ l ʃ ɑ̃ t e ʒ u s y ʁ s ɛ n
l ə p a ʁ s i f i œ̃ s i ɲ a f i ʁ m a t i f e m i œ̃ d w a s y ʁ s e l ə v ʁ

s ɑ̃ s ɛ̃ k a v n y l ə m ɛ ʁ l v ɛ t e k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ k a t ɔ ʁ z m i l k a t ʁ s ɑ̃ v ɪ t ɹ i s y ʁ s ɛ n
v ɛ̃ t t ʁ w a ʁ y d o d œ̃ k a ʁ ɑ̃ t e œ̃ t ʁ w a s ɑ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ t f ɔ s e
s ɔ̃ l a p ɛ̃ a f ɛ t œ̃ p ʁ o l a p s y s

s ɔ̃ n ɔ̃ k l k i ɛ p ʁ ɛ t ʁ a ɡ ʁ ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ ɛ̃ f l y ɑ̃ s e s ɔ̃ n e d y k a s j ɔ̃ k ʁ e t j ɛ n

s ə p ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ l a l ɛ k s ɑ̃ d ʁ ɛ̃ k l a s i k ʁ ɛ s t a l ɔ n œ ʁ ʃ e l e p a ʁ n a s j ɛ̃

ɔ̃ n o ʁ ɛ p y p ɑ̃ s e k ə ʁ ə n e f u ʁ n j e ʁ ə n ɔ̃ s ʁ ɛ
d i v ɛ ʁ p w a s ɔ̃ z ɛ̃ s ɛ k t ɡ ʁ ə n u j z w a z o u ɑ̃ k ɔ ʁ k o ʃ ɔ̃ z i ɔ̃ t ʁ u v e l œ ʁ b ɔ n œ ʁ
l ɛ s k a l j e ɛ d e p o z e d ɑ̃ l ɛ l n ɔ ʁ d y p a l ɛ d y l a t ʁ ɑ̃ l a n u v ɛ l ʁ e z i d ɑ̃ s p a p a l
l ə t ɑ̃ s ə ʁ a ʃ o
s ɛ ʁ t ɛ n s ɔ̃ m ɛ m d ə k ɔ̃ p l ɛ t f ɔ ʁ ʒ ə ʁ i
l e p a t m o t ʁ i s t ʁ ɛ l ɔ̃ ɡ k ɔ m ʃ e l e z o t ʁ l i t o d s ɔ̃ t e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ e p i n ø z
i l f ɛ d e z e t y d d a ʁ ʃ i t ɛ k t y ʁ
s i ɔ̃ s ɔ n ɛ s ə n ɛ p a m a d a m
m ɛ z i l n ə t ʁ a v a j ɛ p a k o s ɑ̃ t ʁ k ɔ m ɛ ʁ s j a l
s ə l a d ɔ n y n i d e d y k l i m a k i p ø t i s e v i ʁ p a ʁ f w a l i v ɛ ʁ
i l ɛ t a l a k y i z i n
m ə m s ɛ k s m ə m a ʒ
p ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ l a ɡ ɛ ʁ f ʁ ɑ̃ k o p ʁ y s j ɛ n l ə d a ʁ t i j ʁ i k ɔ̃ b a a ʃ ɑ̃ p i n j i k u l m j e l w a n j i e o m a n
ʒ ə l ə ʁ ə t i ʁ m a d a m l a p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃ t
n e ɑ̃ m w ɛ̃ l e k ɔ̃ s i n j f ɛ t z o m o d ɛ l z e f o t o ɡ ʁ a f z ɛ k s k l y d e z ɔ ʁ m ɛ k l ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ s ə t i p d i m a ʒ
a p ʁ ɛ k ə l a ʁ e b ɛ l j ɔ̃ a e t e ʁ e p ʁ i m e l ə d o m ɛ n ɛ d ɔ n e o k l ɑ̃ k o ʁ i k i

i l ɛ n ɛ p a l a

s ə k ɑ̃ t ɔ̃ ɛ t ɔ ʁ ɡ a n i z e o t u ʁ d ə m a ʁ ɛ n d ɑ̃ l a ʁ ɔ̃ d i s m ɑ̃ d ə ʁ o ʃ f ɔ ʁ
d ə n ɔ̃ b ʁ ø b a t o s ɔ̃ t e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ d e t ʁ y i z e d ø p ɛ ʁ s ɔ n m œ ʁ

ʒ ə ɛ m a p ɛ l f j ʊ l ʌ p
i l s ə ʁ ɑ̃ s y ʁ l i l u i l t ʁ u v p l y z j œ ʁ k ɑ̃ t ɔ̃ z ɑ̃ p l ɛ n ɛ̃ s y ʁ ɛ k s j ɔ̃

i l ɛ t ɑ̃ t ɛ ʁ e d ɑ̃ l a ʃ a p ɛ l d o v ɛ ʁ ɲ d ə l a k o k a t e d ʁ a l s ɛ̃ ʒ ɑ̃ d ə l a v a l ɛ t
ɛ l s o ʁ j ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ s y i t v ɛ ʁ l a ʁ ə ʃ ɛ ʁ ʃ ɑ̃ n i m y n o l o ʒ i e ɑ̃ p a ʁ a z i t o l o ʒ i
i l z ɔ̃ t y n p ʁ o d y k s j ɔ̃ d ə k a l i t e e s a v s ɑ̃ t u ʁ e d a ʁ t i s t z e d u v ʁ i e o t m ɑ̃ k a l i f j e

l e k ɔ̃ n m aː l f ɔ ʁ m d ə b a t ɔ n ɛ s i l ɛ̃ d ʁ i k d y n d i z ɛ n d ə s ɑ̃ t i m ɛ t ʁ d ə l ɔ̃
n e ɑ̃ m w ɛ̃ ɑ̃ ʁ i ʁ ə n e ʁ i n ə d w a p a z ɛ t ʁ k ɔ̃ s i d e ʁ e k ɔ m œ̃ f i l o z ɔ f k a ʁ t e z j ɛ̃

i l ʁ ə l i l e v i l d ə p a ʁ ɛ̃ ɡ a e ɹ ɛ n m ɑː k

ɛ l a t ə l j e k ɔ̃ t p l y d ə t ʁ ɑ̃ t p ɛ ʁ s ɔ n s t i l i s t m o d e l i s t z e k u t y ʁ j ɛ ʁ

a l ɔ ʁ p a ʁ l e v i t
ʁ ə n e k i s ɛ t e l w a n j e ɛ̃ s ɑ̃ s i b l ə m ɑ̃ m ə f ɛ t œ̃ s i ɲ e d i s p a ʁ ɛ
t ʁ ɛ b j ɛ̃ k ɛ l ɛ ɛ l a v i d ə l a k ɔ m i s j ɔ̃ a v i d e f a v o ʁ a b l m ə s j ø l ə p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃
s ɛ t y n s t a s j ɔ̃ b a l n e ɛ ʁ p o p y l ɛ ʁ d ə l a k oː t d y j ɔ ʁ k ʃ i ʁ
s a t ɛ t ɛ t ɔ ʁ n e d y n ɡ ʁ ɑ̃ d t a ʃ n w a ʁ
l e s ɑ̃ s j ɛ l d ə s ɔ̃ p a ʁ k u ʁ z ɑ̃ p ʁ œ̃ t d e ɡ ɔ ʁ ʒ s i n y ø z
l ə m a ʁ k i n a p a p y s ə b a t ʁ ɑ̃ d y ɛ l
ɛ l ɛ s i t y e d ɑ̃ l ə n o ʁ ɛ s t d y m ɛ n e l w a ʁ
œ̃ ʃ ə m ɛ̃ d ə f ɛ ʁ a k ʁ e m a j ɛ ʁ ʁ ə l j ɛ t a l o ʁ i ʒ i n l o t ɛ l o k a z i n o
p ø a p ø n ɛ t ɑ̃ t ʁ l e d ø z ɔ m z y n ʁ ə l a s j ɔ̃ p ɛ ʁ v ɛ ʁ s
t o m a z i n z i s y d e œ̃ v j ɛ j f a m i j k a t o l i k d ə ɛ l a b ə d iː n ʃ ə
y n t ɑ̃ p ɛ t d ə n ɛ ʒ s a b a s y ʁ s p ɹ ɪ ŋ f iː l d
m i l s ɛ t s ɑ̃ v ɛ̃ t y i t a l e d y v j ø p ɔ̃ d ə s ɛ v ʁ k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ d u z s ɑ̃ b u l ɔ ɲ b i j ɑ̃ k u ʁ
s ə p ɔ ɛ m ʁ ə f l ɛ t l ɑ̃ t i m i l i t a ʁ i s m d ə ʒ a k p ʁ e v ɛ ʁ
l œ ʁ d j a l ɛ k t d ə t i p ɛ ʁ s a p a ʁ ɑ̃ t ɛ t a l a l ɑ̃ ɡ a l ɡ ɔ̃ k i n
ʒ i ɛ s p ɛ ʁ k ə n u z i ʁ ɔ̃ p l y v i t
ɔ̃ ʁ ə t ʁ u v l ə m o ɛ̃ p e t ʁ ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ l a n o m ɑ̃ k l a t y ʁ d e z a d m i n i s t ʁ a s j ɔ̃ b ɛ l ʒ f ʁ ɑ̃ k o f o n
o ʒ u ʁ d y i s ə v i l a ʒ d i s p ɔ z d ə n ɔ̃ b ʁ ø z o t ɛ l
i l ɛ t e l y ʒ w œ ʁ d y s j ɛ k l p a ʁ l e ʁ u m ɛ̃
s ɛ t a ʁ t i s t s y f i z ɛ t ɛ̃ s i a t u l e b ə z w ɛ̃ d ə ɛ l a ʁ i s t ɔ k ʁ a s i
ʒ ə k ʁ w a k i l n ə v j ɛ̃ d ʁ ɔ̃ p a
ʁ y d e ɡ ʁ ɛ p k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ d i s ɑ̃ f ɛ ʃ l e ɡ l i z
k ə v o t ʁ s ɛ n j ø ʁ i ɡ a ʁ d s ɔ̃ ʃ a p o s y ʁ s a t ə t
i l ɛ s ɛ̃ t e ʁ ɛ s ɑ̃ n u t ʁ o m e k a n i s m d ə l a ʒ ɛ ʁ m i n a s j ɔ̃ ɛ̃ s i k a l a v ɛ ʁ n a l i z a s j ɔ̃
ʒ y l b o k ɑ̃ d e e t ɛ m a ʁ j e p ɛ ʁ d ə s ɛ̃ k ɑ̃ f ɑ̃ t ʁ w a ɡ a ʁ s ɔ̃ z e d ø f i j
ʁ y b ɛ ʁ t ʁ ɑ̃ d ə b ɔ ʁ n o t f ɔ ʁ
ʁ y a d ɔ l f p a ʒ o k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ d u z s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t a n t ə n i
s ə t a ʃ e l e v ɛ t m ɑ̃ z ɑ̃ ʁ a m a s ɑ̃ d e m yː ʁ
n u s ɔ m f j ɛ ʁ d a v w a ʁ ɡ a n j e l a p a ʁ t i
ɛ l ʁ ɑ̃ p ɔ ʁ t a d ø ʁ ə p ʁ i z l ə p ʁ i ʁ ɔ̃ p ɔ l
s p e s j a l i s t d y d u b l i l a p a ʁ t i s i p e a v ɛ k a l ɛ k s ɑ̃ d ʁ b ə l j a k ɔ v a p l y z j œ ʁ k ɔ̃ p e t i s j ɔ̃ z ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ n a s j o n a l
a s ə ʒ u ʁ o k œ̃ m o d ɛ l d ə p ʁ e ɔ̃ n a e t e v e ʁ i f j e e k ɔ̃ s e k a m ɑ̃ l a ʁ ʒ ə m ɑ̃ a k s ɛ p t e
l ə ʒ a ʁ d ɛ̃ d ə f l œ ʁ k l o d ə m y ʁ z ɛ p l ɑ̃ t e p a ʁ t ɛ m d ə k u l œ ʁ
i l n u z a p ɛ j e l a ɡ ʁ ɛ n e p i l ə ʃ ɑ̃ p a ɲ p a s ə l y i d e t u ʁ i s t
d e f i b ʁ d ə m o d y l t ʁ ɛ z e l v e p ø v t ɛ t ʁ ɔ b t ə n y z a p ʁ ɛ z e t i ʁ a ʒ
s ɛ t v ɑ̃ t a e t e ɛ̃ t ɛ ʁ d i t p u ʁ s ə k i k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ n l e s o s j e t e f ʁ ɑ̃ s ɛ z
i l s j ɛ ʒ s y ʁ p l y z j œ ʁ k o m i t e d ə f ɔ̃ d ə ʁ ə t ʁ ɛ t e d o t ʁ p l a s m ɑ̃
ɛ l ɛ t y n k ɔ̃ p o z ɑ̃ t e s ɑ̃ s j ɛ l d y p ʁ ɔ ɡ ʁ a m ɛ ʃ l ɔ̃
ɛ̃ s i s a s ɑ̃ d ʁ a f ʁ ɛ s k o e s ɑ̃ p e d ʁ o ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ v e y n k ɔ̃ s o n ɑ̃ s p ɔ ʁ t y ɡ ɛ z
m a ʁ j e a ɑ̃ ʁ j ɛ t f a b y s d ə v ɛ ʁ n ɑ̃
d ə s ɛ t ɑ̃ s j ɛ n m ɛ z ɔ̃ s ɛ n j ø ʁ j a l i l n ə s y b z i s t k y n t u ʁ i z o l e
ɛ l ɛ n ɔ m e ɑ̃ l ɔ n œ ʁ d ə p ɔ l ʃ o m d ɛ d ə m ɛ z ɔ n ø v f ɔ̃ d a t œ ʁ d ə m ɔ̃ ʁ e a l
l ə k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ d e n a s j ɔ̃ z ɛ l ɔ ʁ k ɛ s t ʁ d ə l a k a p ɛ l a ʁ ɛ a l d ə k a t a l y n j a
i l ɛ s a ʒ i d e ɛ̃ s e ʁ e l e m o ɪ n s i t y a p ʁ ɛ l ə m o k ɔ̃ t ʁ oː l
p ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ l e t ʁ a v o l o t ɛ l s ə ʁ ə ɡ ʁ u p s y ʁ l ɛ l s y d
l e z a b i t ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ m ɛ̃ t n ɑ̃ l i b ʁ z e k i t l a v i l

i l a e t e e l v e a p a ʁ i ɑ̃ f ʁ ɑ̃ s p a ʁ d e p a ʁ ɑ̃ ʁ e f y ʒ j e z a ʁ m e n j ɛ̃
i l ɛ l œ̃ d e z a ʁ t i s t l e p l y z e m i n ɑ̃ d e z i l z ɑ̃ ɡ l o n ɔ ʁ m ɑ̃ d

s a v o l a p ɛ n
f ʁ y s t ʁ e d ɛ t ʁ s e l i b a t ɛ ʁ m ɔ̃ t a n a m ʊə s ə l ɑ̃ s d ɑ̃ z y n k ɛ t ɛ̃ t ɑ̃ s d ə l aː m s œ ʁ
i l f ɛ p a ʁ t i d ə l a b ʁ i ɡ a d f ʁ ɑ̃ k o a l m ɑ̃ d o s ɛ̃ d ə l a d i v i z j ɔ̃
s ɛ l ə ʃ ɛ ʁ ʃ œ ʁ e e k ʁ i v ɛ̃ b ɛ ʁ n a ʁ f a ʁ i z j ɛ̃ k i f i n i p a ʁ d e k u v ʁ i ʁ l a v e ʁ i t e
d ø ʁ u t d y s i ʁ k y i d y t ʁ e ɡ ɔ ʁ v ɛ̃ t n œ f s i s ɑ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ t p l u ɡ a s n u
s ɛ t a s o s j a s j ɔ̃ v i z p ʁ ɛ̃ s i p a l m ɑ̃ a ɡ a ʁ ɑ̃ t i ʁ l a ʁ e a l i z a s j ɔ̃ d e m i s j ɔ̃ z e d e z ɔ b ʒ ɛ k t i f p ʁ e d e t ɛ ʁ m i n e
ɛ l f ɛ m i n d ə ʁ ə m ɔ̃ t e
ɛ l ɛ k ɔ̃ p o z e d ə f i l o s t ɛ̃ p iː t ə b ɛ ʁ ɡ m a n d a v i d ɔ s m ɑ̃ e f i l i p p ʁ ɔ k t ɔ ʁ
e s y ʁ s ə f ɛ b l ɛ̃ d i s v u v u z ɛ ɡ z a l t e z ɛ̃ s i
o l ɛ̃ p a l ɔ ʁ s ɛ p a d e v ʁ ɛ z a ʁ t i s t
s e ɛ p u ʁ k w a l eɪ d i ʒ o z j a n v i l a b ɔ k s

a s ɔ̃ n aː ʒ s e t ɛ t y n ɛ̃ d i k a s j ɔ̃ d ɛ m a b l ɑ̃ b ɔ̃ p w ɛ̃
i l ɛ l ə m ɛ m k ə l ə p ʁ e s e d ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ z œ̃ d o m ɛ n d i f e ʁ ɑ̃ s ə l y i d e s ɛ s j ɔ̃ z i m o b i l j ɛ ʁ
l e p s i t a k y l s ɔ̃ f ʁ y ʒ i v o ʁ z e f l o ʁ i v o ʁ

a s ə l y i l a i l ɛ ɡ a ʁ s ɔ̃

œ̃ d ə m i t u ʁ

s e ɛ t ɛ̃ p ɔ ʁ t ɑ̃ d ə ʁ e f l e ʃ i ʁ l e d a t z e l ə t ɑ̃ k i s ɔ̃ s u v ɑ̃ ʃ ɑ̃ ʒ e
a p ʁ ɛ d ø z ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ ʃ a m œ ʁ e ʒ ɔ f ʁ w a p ɛ ʁ s e d ʁ w a s y ʁ a l v i t o
ʒ ɛ ʁ m ɛ̃ u v ʁ l a p ɔ ʁ t d y f ɔ̃

l e z a b i t ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ l e z e v a l b ɛ ʁ t w a

a m ɔ ʃ e t ɛ m a l ø ʁ ø

t ʁ ɑ̃ t ʁ y ɛ m ɛ s ɛ d i s j a k a k a a n i k a t ʁ v ɛ̃ d i s ɛ t s i s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t d i z w ɑ̃ ɡ a n i

v o t ʁ p ʁ e n ɔ̃ s i l v u p l ɛ

s ɛ t k ɑ̃ t i f i k a s j ɔ̃ p ø t ɛ t ʁ ɛ̃ d ɛ k s e s y ʁ l ə p w a d ə l a p ɛ ʁ s ɔ n

t u t l e z ɛ s p ɛ s s ɔ̃ t ɛ k t o p a ʁ a z i t d w a z o
s ə l a p ʁ o v o k y n p a n i k

n u n u p ɔ ʁ t ə ʁ j ɔ̃ m j ø s i n u s y i v j ɔ̃ ɛ l a v i d y ʁ a p ɔ ʁ t œ ʁ

ʒ ə ʒ y ʒ ɛ k i l i ɑ̃ n a v ɛ b o k u p e p ø t ɛ t ʁ p l y d ə s ɑ̃
o m e e d o l o ʁ ɛ s s ə ʁ ə ɡ a ʁ d ɛ ʁ s œ l
l ə p e d ɔ̃ k y l p ɔ ʁ t d ə l ɔ̃ ɡ b ʁ a k t e z o b o v a l
œ̃ n ɔ ʁ d i n a t œ ʁ k ɑ̃ t i k n e s ɛ s i t œ̃ t o d ɛ ʁ œ ʁ p l y f ɛ b l k œ̃ s i m y l a t œ ʁ k ɑ̃ t i k
v ɑ̃ s ə s l a k ʁ y t a e k ʁ i s t j ɑ̃ ʒ i
a v n y ɛ m e b u ʁ o o n y m e ʁ o t ʁ ɑ̃ t k a t ʁ
l a m ɔ n ɛ d ə l a s l o v e n i e t ɛ l ə t o l a ʁ a v ɑ̃ l a d ɔ p s j ɔ̃ d ə l ø ʁ o
s ɛ t ɛ s p ɛ s f i t o f a ʒ a y n ɡ a m d oː t t ʁ ɛ l a ʁ ʒ
i l ɛ t o s i l e ɡ a ɑ̃ ɔ̃ ɡ ʁ i
ʒ ə v u s y ɡ ʒ ɛ ʁ d ɔ̃ k d ə ʁ ə t i ʁ e s ɛ t a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃
ʒ ə n ə d i p a s ə l a
i l n ɛ ɡ z i s t p a z a s ɛ̃ p j ɛ ʁ e m i k l ɔ̃ d ɛ s p ɛ s e d ə s u z ɛ s p ɛ s d ə m a m i f ɛ ʁ ɑ̃ d e m i k
ʒ e l j ø d ə p ɑ̃ s e k ə v u z a v e s y t u ʃ e s ɔ̃ k œ ʁ
o p ʁ o s ɛ d ə n y ʁ ɑ̃ b ɛ ʁ ɡ i l ɛ t a k i t e

l e m a ʁ ɛ̃ d y p ɔ ʁ d ə k j ɛ l s ə m y t i n
o ʁ j ɔ̃ n u p y ʃ a s e d y l u v ʁ a n u s œ l l e t ʁ u p d ə p o l i n j a k

l e d i f i s s ə ʁ a f i n a l m ɑ̃ d e t ʁ y i e ʁ ɑ̃ p l a s e p a ʁ d e z i m ø b l
y n a v ɑ̃ t y ʁ l y i ɛ p ʁ ɛ t e d y ʁ ɑ̃ l a ɡ ɛ ʁ a v ɛ k l a k t ʁ i s k o ʁ i n l y ʃ ɛ ʁ
k a t ʁ ʁ y d ə l a k ʁ w a p u l ɛ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ t s ɛ̃ k s ɛ̃ s ɑ̃ v ɛ̃ t a m ə l ɛ s
i l ɛ s ɑ̃ t ʁ a v a j
i l ɔ b t j ɛ̃ t œ̃ b a k a l o ʁ e a e k o n o m i k e s o s j a l s p e s j a l i t e ɑ̃ ɡ l ɛ z o l i s e v i k t ɔ ʁ y ɡ o d ə k ɑ̃
l a s o s j a s j ɔ̃ p s i k a n a l i t i k ɔ̃ ɡ ʁ w a z ɛ k ʁ e e a b y d a p ɛ s t l ə p a ʁ s ɑ̃ d ɔ ʁ f ə ʁ ɑ̃ k z i
t u t s e p y b l i k a s j ɔ̃ s ɔ̃ t e k ʁ i t z ɑ̃ n ɑ̃ ɡ l ɛ s o f m ɑ̃ s j ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ ɛ ʁ
s e d ɛ ʁ n j ɛ ʁ p ʁ e v w a t œ̃ ʁ ɛ ɡ l ə m ɑ̃ ɑ̃ n œ f a k ɔ̃ t l ə d ɛ ʁ n j e k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ n ɑ̃ l ə k l o ʃ e
ʁ y d ə n ɔ̃ s j ɛ n a b y l j ɔ̃
m i l y i s ɑ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ t d ø

i l a ʁ i v a t ʁ ɛ v i t a t ʁ u v e y n p ə t i t ʁ y ɛ l

ɔ f m a n k ɔ̃ s t a t a k ə s a p ə t i t f i j ɛ t ɛ̃ t e ɡ ʁ e d ɑ̃ s a p ʁ ɔ p ʁ k ɔ̃ p a n i
l ə p oː l y ʁ b ɛ̃ ɛ f ɔ ʁ m e p a ʁ l y n i t e y ʁ b ɛ n k ɔ̃ s t i t y e d ə p ɒ n t ɪ v i e l ə s u ʁ n
ɔ̃ n y d i k ə k ɛ l k ə ʃ ɔ z d ə p ɔ ʁ t o m ɔ ʁ v ə n ɛ d ə m u ʁ i ʁ ɑ̃ l y i
n u z o ʁ ɔ̃ p ø t ə t ʁ d ə l a p l y i d i l ə p a ʁ i z j ɛ̃

a n i t a s ɑː k iː z iə n n ɛ p ʁ ɛ d ə t o ʁ ɔ̃ t o d ɑ̃ z y n f a m i j d o ʁ i ʒ i n a ʁ m e n j ɛ n
œ̃ b ɛ l ɛ ɡ z ɑ̃ p l ɛ l a d y n d y p i l a a l a t ɛ s t d ə b ʌ tʃ

ɛ l ɛ t o ʒ u ʁ d y i ʁ ə l j e a l a v n y l y s j ɛ̃ d ɛ s k a v p a ʁ œ̃ s u t ɛ ʁ ɛ̃ p a s ɑ̃ s u l ə p e ʁ i f e ʁ i k
k ɔ m v u ɛ l a v e d i l e m e d i k a m ɑ̃ z a t y b e n e f i s i t a œ̃ p ə t i n ɔ̃ b ʁ d ə p a s j ɑ̃

s ɛ s ə k i ɛ t e t ʁ ɑ̃ ʒ

i l z ɔ̃ t e t e e d y k e z ɑ̃ ʁ y s i e p a ʁ l k u ʁ a m ɑ̃ l ə ʁ y s

l a ʁ i v j ɛ ʁ b l ɑ̃ ʃ e l ə l a k b o ʃ ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ t o k œ ʁ d y d e v l ɔ p m ɑ̃ d y s ɛ k t œ ʁ

d u z e k i p p a ʁ t i s i p t o t u ʁ n w a f i n a l
s ɛ l ə d e f i o k ɛ l s a t ɛ l k ʁ i s t ɔ f k i ʃ n ɛ̃ p ʁ e z i d ɑ̃ d ɔ n œ ʁ d ə l a f ɔ ʁ m a s j ɔ̃

s ɛ t a v ɑ̃ t y ʁ p ɛ ʁ m ɛ t ʁ a a ʁ ɔ b d ə d e k u v ʁ i ʁ œ̃ s ɑ̃ s a s a v i
s ɔ̃ f ʁ ɛ ʁ m a n y ɛ l s ɑ̃ t a k a t a l i n a e t ɛ t o s i f ʊ t b ɐ l ɜː

v j ɛ̃ s ɔ ʁ t ɔ̃ d e i s i

l ə p ɛ ʁ s ə ʁ ɛ s ɔ̃ m a ʁ i

l o ʁ i ʒ i n d y v i l a ʒ ɛ l e ʒ ɑ̃ d ɛ ʁ
m ɛ z i l d e m i s j ɔ n d ə n u v o l ɔ ʁ s k ə l ə p ʁ ɛ̃ s d ə p o l i n j a k d ə v j ɛ̃ p ʁ ə m j e m i n i s t ʁ
s ɑ̃ d u t k ɛ l k ə s ɛ̃ l i v ʁ k ɛ l k ə ʃ a p l ɛ y n i k k ɛ l k ə ʁ ə l i k p ʁ u v ə

y n ʒ y p n w a ʁ

s ɔ ʁ l ə ʃ j ɛ̃
a p ʁ ɛ l ɔ b t ɑ̃ s j ɔ̃ d y d i p l oː m d ə f ʁ ə ʒ i l z a v ɛ t y n k o ʁ ɛ s p ɔ̃ d ɑ̃ s p l y z e t ʁ w a t

m a ɡ ɹ a n d m iə a b j ɛ̃ k ɔ n y ɛ m ɡ o ɡ ɛ̃ a ʒ u t d ə n u v o l ə f ɛ ʁ m j e

l a ʁ y i n d ə d y ʁ t a j ʁ ə m ɔ̃ t ʁ ɛ t o ɡ ɛ ʁ d ə ʁ ə l i ʒ j ɔ̃
s e ɛ l a l ɑ̃ ɡ m a t ɛ ʁ n ɛ l d e j a k u b a

l ɔ̃ ɡ œ ʁ n œ f l i n j

l ə m e k a n i s j ɛ̃ ʒ ɔ ʁ ʒ l a n ɛ ɛ t y e s y ʁ l ə k u
i l s ɔ̃ v ɛ t y d ə l ɔ̃ v ɛ t m ɑ̃ d ɔ̃ t ɔ̃ v w a l e p l i
l a k ɔ m y n o t e d ə k ɔ m y n z ɛ s u m i z o ʁ e ʒ i m d ə l a f i s k a l i t e p ʁ o f ɛ s j ɔ n ɛ l y n i k
d ø u t ʁ w a z a m i d ə m ə s j ø d ə l a m ɔ l p ɑ̃ s ɛ k ɔ m l a b e p i ʁ a ʁ
i l a n i m e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ d e ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ z e d e z a t ə l j e d e k ʁ i t y ʁ ɑ̃ m i l j ø s k o l ɛ ʁ
s ɔ̃ f ʁ ɛ ʁ m i ʁ ɔ s l a v m a s j a s k o f ɛ t o s i p a ʁ t i d ə l e k i p n a s j o n a l s l o v a k d ə b j a t l ɔ̃

l o t ʁ p a ʁ t i k y l a ʁ i t e d ə s e f a m p ɛ̃ t p a ʁ f ʁ ɑ̃ s w a ɡ ʁ ɔ s l j ɛ ʁ ɛ l a b s ɑ̃ s d ə ʁ ə ɡ a ʁ
i l a ʒ u t ɛ t ʁ ø ʁ ø k ɑ̃ t i l p ɔ ʁ t l ə m a j o d ə l a s e l ɛ k s j ɔ̃ ʁ y s

œ̃ l i v ʁ n w a ʁ

s ø l a

i l z a v ɛ d i s t ʁ i b y e l a p ʁ ɛ s k l ɑ̃ d ɛ s t i n
l ə ɡ u v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃ a k ɔ̃ f i ʁ m e s ɔ̃ s u ɛ d e œ̃ m i k s d ə p ʁ o d y k s j ɔ̃ d e e l ɛ k t ʁ i s i t e ɛ̃ k l y ɑ̃ l ə n y k l e ɛ ʁ
l ə k u p l n a p a d ə d ɛ s ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ s
d ə p y i l a p e ʁ j ɔ d k a ʁ o l ɛ̃ ʒ j ɛ n l a p a p o t e ɛ t ə n y d ɑ̃ z y n s i t y a s j ɔ̃ d ɛ̃ f e ʁ j o ʁ i t e k ʁ o n i k
ɛ̃ p ɔ s i b l e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ d ə m e k ɔ n ɛ t ʁ l ɔ n ɛ t ɔ m
b j ɛ̃ k i l ɛ t y l j ø ɑ̃ n e k ɔ s l e k ɔ̃ s e k ɑ̃ s s ə f ɔ̃ s ɑ̃ t i ʁ ʒ y s k a k a l k y t a
s ɛ s d ə f ɛ ʁ l a t ɛ t
s e t ɛ t œ̃ m i l i t ɛ ʁ œ̃ n ɛ k s p ɛ ʁ d ə l a ʁ ʃ i t ɛ k t y ʁ m i l i t ɛ ʁ e œ̃ n e k ʁ i v ɛ̃
l a f a m i j l a ʃ a s d ə l a m ɛ z ɔ̃
k ɔ m s a ʒ ə p u ʁ e m ə p l ɛ̃ d ʁ d ə n ə p a z ɛ t ʁ ʁ ə p ʁ e z ɑ̃ t e p a ʁ l ə ɡ u v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃
ʃ ə m ɛ̃ d ə l a ɛ̃ ɡ ʁ i s w a s ɑ̃ t y i s i s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t ʁ ɔ̃ b a k l ə f ʁ ɑ̃

t y ɛ f a t i ɡ e ʁ ə p ʁ i l o t ʁ
